components.description:
A yellow face with simple, open eyes and no mouth, as if at a loss for words. Meaning widely varies, but commonly conveys speechlessness, humility, and silence. May also convey moderately negative emotions, such as disappointment, frustration, or sadness. 

Samsung’s design previously featured raised eyebrows and blushing cheeks.
components.title: Face Without Mouth

description:
A yellow face with simple, open eyes and no mouth, as if at a loss for words. Meaning widely varies, but commonly conveys speechlessness, humility, and silence. May also convey moderately negative emotions, such as disappointment, frustration, or sadness. 

Samsung’s design previously featured raised eyebrows and blushing cheeks.
title: Face Without Mouth

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.definition: This emoji has eyes, and no mouth. Represents silence, as this emoji is always silent. Imagine the things he would say if he had a mouth! Fa http://emojipedia.org/face-without-mouth/
emoji_net_data.name: face without mouth

bn:00100974a: Deliberately impassive or expressionless (as a face or look).

bn:00097677a: Perplexed by many conflicting situations or statements; filled with bewilderment
Perplexed by many conflicting situations or statements; filled with bewilderment.

bn:00109358a: Having little motion or activity; calm.
Characterized by an absence or near absence of agitation or activity

bn:00102161a: Determined or actuated by emotion rather than reason.
Determined or actuated by emotion rather than reason
Determined by emotion rather than reason.

bn:00099910a: Totally uninformed about what is going on; not having even a clue from which to infer what is occurring

bn:00110624a: Free from sound or noise; absolutely still; perfectly quiet.
Marked by the complete lack of sound or noise.

bn:00097645a: Having no mouth or mouthlike opening

bn:00089538v: Cause to be quiet or not talk
To become quiet; to cease making sounds.
To cause to be quiet or not talk.

bn:00089539v: To make someone or something become quieter.

bn:00032600n: Part of the body at the front of the head
The face is a central organ of sense and is also very central in the expression of emotion among humans and among numerous other species.
Faces are the central sense organ complexes, for those animals that have one, normally on the ventral surface of the head.
The front of the human head from the forehead to the chin and ear to ear
The front part of the head, featuring the eyes, nose, and mouth and the surrounding area.

bn:00046516n: A person, especially as one among many.
An individual is a person or a specific object.
A single physical human being as a legal subject, as opposed to a legal person such as a corporation.
A human; someone susceptible to death.

A person is a being, such as a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood, which in turn is defined differently by different authors in different disciplines, and by different cultures in different times and places.
A person that will die eventually.
A being, such as a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood
Abstract term defining a being, e.g. a human, that has certain capacities or attributes constituting personhood (not for use with "instance of" [P31], instead use "human" [Q5])
An individual; usually a human being.

bn:00032512n: An organ of vision that detects light
Organ that detects light and converts it into electro-chemical impulses in neurons
The two eyes of a human being considered as a whole.
A window or other opening that has an oval or circular shape (as of an eye).
An organ through which animals see.
Eyes are sensory organs of the face responsible for sight.
An oculus, plural oculi, from Latin oculus: eye, denotes a circular opening in the center of a dome or in a wall.
Eyes are the organs of vision.
The part of the eye having a spherical shape.
The organ that is sensitive to light, which it converts to electrical signals passed to the brain, by which means animals see.

bn:00015163n: Fink, aka Fin Greenall, is an English singer, songwriter, guitarist, producer and DJ, born in Cornwall and currently based in Berlin and London.
Someone acting as an informer or decoy for the police
Or Fin Greenall, English singer and songwriter
A decoy or an informer, especially one who is a spy for the police.

bn:00065703n: A relative or total lack of sound
Lack of audible sound or presence of sounds of very low intensity
The complete lack of sound or noise.
Silence is the lack of audible sound or presence of sounds of very low intensity.

bn:00069369n: A length of intestine, stuffed with ground (organ) meat, and other ingredients. Instead of intestines, a different kind of wrapper can be used.
A food made of ground meat (or meat substitute) and seasoning, packed in a cylindrical casing; a length of this food.
Highly seasoned minced meat stuffed in casings
Food usually made from ground meat with a skin around it
A sausage is a food usually made from ground meat with a skin around it.

apple_vendor_description: Apple's face without mouth emoji, on Apple devices, presents a strikingly minimalist and enigmatic expression. The smooth, spherical face is rendered with gentle gradients and soft rounded edges, creating a blank canvas for interpretation.  Its lack of a mouth leaves the viewer to infer a range of emotions, from speechless contemplation to quiet uncertainty or a deliberate withholding of words. This unique emoji effectively communicates a feeling of being unable to express oneself, or a moment of profound silence.
